mapper.select: SELECT a.authorities,b.* FROM authorities a JOIN users b ON a.userno=b.userno WHERE userId=#{userId} AND userPassword=#{userPassword}
SELECT count(*) from USERS where userId='${userId}'

SELECT cart.USERNO , u.USERNICKNAME , product.PDNO , product.PHOTONO, product.PDPRICE, photo.PHOTOURL FROM CART cart INNER JOIN PRODUCT product ON cart.PDNO = product.PDNO INNER JOIN PHOTO photo ON product.PHOTONO = photo.PHOTONO INNER JOIN USERS u ON cart.USERNO = u.USERNO WHERE cart.USERNO = #{userId}
